interfaces.kernel

Interface JCL_task

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface JCL_task
extends java.io.Serializable
    A task is composed by an object name + object nickname + a method to be remotely invoked + the method args + the class to be executed and the task execution time
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joubert

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getHost()
      Returns Host ip.
      boolean getHostChange()
      Returns true if this task can run in other host.

      Returns the method parameters of the task.

      Returns the task times.

      Set hostChange: true: can run in other host. false: cann't run in other host.
